sys_update_version.name: sp_rectangle_menu_item_1cabf4a1c380321075ea722ed4013182
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rectangle_menu_item"><sp_rectangle_menu_item action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><color>default</color><condition>gs.isLoggedIn()</condition><display_1/><display_2/><display_date/><filter/><glyph>bell</glyph><hint>My Approvals</hint><kb_article/><kb_category/><kb_topic/><label/><order>400</order><record_script><![CDATA[// only show 30 in header menu dropdown
var max = 30;

var t = data;
t.items = [];
t.count = 0;

t.hint = 'Recent Recognitions';


// use record watchers to tell header when to update dropdown counts
var watchFilter = 'notification=ceafce39c32f621075ea722ed4013143^user=' + gs.getUserID();
t.record_watchers = [];
t.record_watchers.push({'table':'sn_ex_sp_notifs_portal_notification_content','filter':watchFilter});

var z = new GlideRecord('sn_ex_sp_notifs_portal_notification_content');
z.addEncodedQuery(watchFilter);
z.orderByDesc('sys_updated_on');
z.setLimit(max);
z.query();

//notification=^=

var link = {};
link.title = gs.getMessage('View your recognitions');
link.type = 'link';
link.href = '?id=recognition_home#you';

link.items = [];
t.items.push(link);




while (z.next()) {
  var a = {};
  
  var template = z.content_template.toString();
  var params = JSON.parse(z.content_params.toString() || '[]');
  a.short_description = gs.getMessage(template, params);
  
  $sp.getRecordValues(a, z, 'sys_id');
  a.sys_updated_on = z.sys_created_on.toString();
  a.number = z.getDisplayValue();
  a.__table = z.getTableName();
  a.type = 'record';
  a.__page = 'form'; // __page should be string value of the page ID you would like to redirect
  t.items.push(a);
  t.count++;
}

data.badgeHint = gs.getMessage('{0} pending recognition(s)', [''+t.count]);]]></record_script><sc_cat_item/><sc_category/><short_description/><sp_page/><sp_rectangle_menu display_value="PC Header Menu">1786448bc39be21075ea722ed40131d5</sp_rectangle_menu><sp_rectangle_menu_item/><sys_class_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-17 13:12:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>1cabf4a1c380321075ea722ed4013182</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name/><sys_package display_value="PeerCentral" source="x_1794402_peerce_0">b7f1c56ac397621075ea722ed40131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="PeerCentral">b7f1c56ac397621075ea722ed40131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_rectangle_menu_item_1cabf4a1c380321075ea722ed4013182</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-17 14:28:51</sys_updated_on><table/><type>scripted</type><url/><url_target/></sp_rectangle_menu_item><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1cabf4a1c380321075ea722ed4013182"/></record_update>
